channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0430; 09:38AM; 1541 W Cambria St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OLsrSe; #Westlake; It took 52 firefighters 40 minutes to extinguish a vacant two-story duplex on fire (site of a previous burn). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E11 E203 E209 E210 E26 E9 EM11 EM14 RA10 RA11 RA209 RA811 SQ21 T10 T3 T9; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0430; 08:58AM; 1541 W Cambria St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OLsrSe; #Westlake; Two-story duplex (vacant) with fire on the first floor. Offensive mode.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E11 E203 E209 E210 E26 E9 EM11 RA11 RA209 RA811 SQ21 T10 T3 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Rubbish Fire; INC#0342; 08:02AM; 6099 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3INR8cY; #NorthHollywood; Firefighters responded to a rubbish fire which spread to four tiny homes, causing damage. Firefighters quickly extinguished the flames. No reported injures. Cause under investigation. Nothing further. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; E289 E89 RA889 RA89 T89; CH8; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0185; 04:53AM; 800 S Cecilia St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3C5ZuJa; #DowntownLA; It took 55 firefighters 33 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames of an outside rubbish fire, which spread to part of a two-story commercial building. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E203 E209 E210 E211 E3 E4 E9 EM1 RA10 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T3 T9; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0185; 04:20AM; 800 S Cecilia St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3C5ZuJa; #DowntownLA; Outside fire extending inside a two-story commercial building. Offensive mode.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E203 E209 E210 E211 E3 E4 E9 EM1 RA10 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T3 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1135; 06:28PM; 14735 W Bessemer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ILGALy; #VanNuys; Firefighters arrived to find a one-story commercial building containing an upholstery shop and auto body shop with heavy fire inside. Firefighters mounted a coordinated attack on the fire on the ~8,500 sq-ft building. Firefighters overcame forcible entry challenges, both on the exterior and encountering additional security measures inside, to gain access for hose lines to advance, as other crews ascended ladders to the roof to provide vertical ventilation. Ultimately, it took 40 firefighters 23 minutes to extinguish the flames, which were initially spotted and reported by an LAPD helicopter. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E288 E289 E39 E88 E89 JT3 RA839 RA88 T39 T88 T89 UR88; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1135; 06:05PM; 14700 W Bessemer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43Pz4rh; #VanNuys; One-story commercial building with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E288 E39 E88 RA839 RA88 T88; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0564; 11:12AM; 3024 N Runyon Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ouyD6F; #HollywoodHillsWest; Firefighters located a 39-year-old hiker and his dog, who were stranded part way up a steep ravine in the Runyon Canyon area. LAFD set up a 600-foot two-line rope system and performed a low-angle rope rescue to help the man and his "best friend" down to safer ground. Firefighter-Paramedics performed a medical assessment and found no injury or illness, therefore, no hospital transport was needed. Nothing further.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E82 E90 H5 H7 HA5 HA7 RA27 RA41 RA76 RA827 RH114 T27 T61 UR27; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#1220; 06:19PM; 1488 Bienveneda Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oAx338; #PacificPalisades; Firefighters located a 53-year-old female hiker in a remote area of Temescal Canyon with a lower extremity injury. LAFD Air Ops hoisted her and brought her to a nearby helispot, where she received a medical assessment by LAFD Firefighter-Paramedics and then assisted with getting back to her vehicle. She declined transport to the hospital. Nothing further.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E269 E443 H5 H7 HA5 HA7 RA23 RH114 T69; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#1135; 04:47PM; Simi Hills; MAP: https://bit.ly/43s6MTb; #Chatsworth; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to a stranded but uninjured teenage male hiker, who climbed a large boulder in a remote section of Chatsworth Park South, and is unable to descend safely. An LAFD rescue helicopter was able to find the teen, and lowered a rescuer. The pair will soon be hoisted into the hovering LAFD helicopter, and flown to the safety of a nearby helispot.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E106 E296 H3 H5 HA3 HA5 RA96 RH114 T96; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey
